definition.name: frenkel_integral
definition.definition: Frenkel's integral representation (FR-1): For density operators rho, sigma (trace 1) with supp(rho) ⊆ supp(sigma): D(rho||sigma) = ∫₀^∞ [E_gamma(rho||sigma) - (1-gamma)_+] / [gamma(1+gamma)] d gamma. For unnormalised reference tau with Tr[tau] = c > 0 (FR-c): D(rho||tau) = ∫₀^∞ [E_beta(rho||tau) - (1-c beta)_+] / [beta(1+c beta)] d beta - log c.
